content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: PPTESTCD
      operator: contains_case_insensitive
      value: norm by wt
    - name: PPORRESU
      operator: does_not_use_valid_codelist_terms
      value: PKUWG
    - name: PPORRESU
      operator: does_not_use_valid_codelist_terms
      value: PKUWKG
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0557
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when parameter is normalized by weight and terminology
  for PPORRESU is not for a parameter normalized by weight
Outcome:
  Message: Parameter is normalized by weight and terminology for PPORRESU is not for
    a parameter normalized by weight
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0557
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: There are separate codelists used for PPORRESU/PPSTRESU
                  where the choice depends on whether the value of the pharmacokinetic
                  parameter is normalized. Codelist PKUNIT is used for non-normalized
                  parameters. Codelists PKUDMG and PKUDUG are used when parameters
                  are normalized by dose amount in milligrams or micrograms respectively.
                  Codelists PKUWG and PKUWKG are used when parameters are normalized
                  by weight in grams or kilograms respectively. Multiple subset codelists
                  were created for the unique unit expressions of the same concept
                  across codelists, this approach allows study-context appropriate
                  use of unit values for PK analysis subtypes
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 3
                Section: 6.3.5.9.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - PP

json.Description: Trigger error when parameter is normalized by weight and terminology for PPORRESU is not for a parameter normalized by weight

Outcome.Message: Parameter is normalized by weight and terminology for PPORRESU is not for a parameter normalized by weight

Citations.Cited_Guidance: There are separate codelists used for PPORRESU/PPSTRESU where the choice depends on whether the value of the pharmacokinetic parameter is normalized. Codelist PKUNIT is used for non-normalized parameters. Codelists PKUDMG and PKUDUG are used when parameters are normalized by dose amount in milligrams or micrograms respectively. Codelists PKUWG and PKUWKG are used when parameters are normalized by weight in grams or kilograms respectively. Multiple subset codelists were created for the unique unit expressions of the same concept across codelists, this approach allows study-context appropriate use of unit values for PK analysis subtypes
